original_title: Adventures in Odyssey: The Last Days of Eugene Meltsner
overview: Through Whit’s new invention, the Micro-stimulator, Eugene takes a fantastic voyage through his own circulatory system and makes an alarming discovery. Forced to reevaluate how he’ll spend the remaining days of his life, he sets in motion a chain of events that includes a bank heist, a ticking bomb, and a strangely familiar window washer!
title: Adventures in Odyssey: The Last Days of Eugene Meltsner
